nodes.body: {ðŸ•¹ releases} _Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland_ (with music by [Fat Bard](https://www.fatbard.com/)) now has a [Demo available on Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2633950/Rugrats_Adventures_in_Gameland/)!

{ðŸ•¹ releases} _[Nour](https://food.game/)_ by [TJ](https://twitter.com/_Teejay5) is coming out on [PlayStation Plus](https://blog.playstation.com/2024/04/10/playstation-plus-game-catalog-for-april-dave-the-diver-tales-of-kenzera-zau-the-crew-2-and-more/)!!

{ðŸ§Š cool stuff} The new [FlxGameOfLife](https://haxeflixel.com/demos/FlxGameOfLife/) which demonstrates [Conway's Game of Life](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life), made by [Tim I Hely](https://github.com/SeiferTim) is now available on the [HaxeFlixel website](https://haxeflixel.com/)!

{ðŸ—ž RoundUp stuff} We want to expand the usefulness of this site by including some recurring sections in each issue. Like a directory of developers in/associated with our area, lists of games made/being made, etc. [Chime in with your thoughts/suggestions on the Issue](https://github.com/AxolStudio/STLGameDevRoundUp/issues/18)!
{!header} Well, the sun came back after all, so I guess we have to continue on... Check out these new things while we all question our continued existence!
